name: Intro to AI (Codespaces)
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /home/vscode/.continue && [ -f .continue/config.yaml ] && cp -n .continue/config.yaml /home/vscode/.continue/config.yaml || true; if [ -d tutor-ai-panel ]; then (cd tutor-ai-panel && npm install && npm run compile) && EXT=/home/vscode/.vscode-server/extensions && mkdir -p "$EXT/aurnova.tutor-ai-panel-0.1.0" && cp tutor-ai-panel/package.json "$EXT/aurnova.tutor-ai-panel-0.1.0/" && cp -r tutor-ai-panel/out tutor-ai-panel/resources "$EXT/aurnova.tutor-ai-panel-0.1.0/"; fi
